article_title: GOP Candidate Blames Medtronic's Departure On Obamacare

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: Marty Seifert is a Republican running for Governor in Minnesota, where Minneapolis Medtronic is based -- at least until Medtronic's just-announced acquisition of Covidien closes, at which point Medtronic will move its corporate headquarters to Dublin, Ireland, while keeping an "operational" headquarters in Minneapolis, where it employs 8,000 people. The [...]
